Summary: saw lights that were not convetional aircraft and didnt move like normal aircraft
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kauneonga Lake
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy son came home and told me of something that he saw on his way home.he then went out to the frnt porch and said he can see it .so i went and saw it also, it was just a light in the distance and first thought it was a plane then it moved east then it moved straight up then it caught my attention. i called my wife to see it and it moved toward owr direction .i then was listening for the sound of an engine or the sound of a jet nothing!!! as it came over head we heard a slight hissing sound not like any normal aircraft. then my son and i noticed at the same time what we were seeing was blocking out the stars and was much larger than we thought.it then flew slowly in a southern direction out of sight my son tried to photograph it with a cell phohe it didnt come out. the lights were in a diamond pattern with two red ones trailing.no lights were blinking like normal air craft
